text: ya 'ayuha aladhin sddaqu allah warasulah waeamiluu bshreh min yarjie minkum ean dynh, wayastabdil bih alyahudiat 'aw alnsranyt 'aw ghyr dhlk, falan ydrru allah shyyana, wasawf yati allah biqawm khayr minhum yuhibbuhm wyhbwnh, ruhama' bialmuminin ashdda' ealaa alkafryn, yujahidun 'aeda'an allh, wala yakhafun fi dhat allah ahdana. dhlk al'ineam min fadl allah yutih man arad, wallah wasie alfdl, ealim biman ysthqh min ebadh
